extensionDescription.message: Detects times given with time zone abbreviations, and converts them to your local time.

popupManualConvert.message: Manually convert times missing a stated time zone.

popupManualConvertSourceText.message: Please select the source time zone.

popupUnableToFunction.message: The extension is unable to function on this page.
popupUnableToFunction.description: Displayed on pages that disallow the extension.

tooltipConverted.message: Converted to your local time from "$TIME$".
tooltipConverted.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over a converted time. Includes the orignal unconverted time

tooltipUnconverted.message: Converted to your local time this is "$TIME$".
tooltipUnconverted.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over an unconverted time. Includes the converted time
